casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Edward WILSON. No. 257A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2007. Jane A. Gilchrist, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 643 S.E.2d 620.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of June 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2007."
